lenders.name: Michael-Jürgen
lenders.loan_because:
The best way to help people is to help them stand on their own and be productive.

Though I've long been impressed with microfinance's ability to make a difference in people's lives around the world, I never thought I'd get directly involved, because I don't know that much about business or finance. Then, I heard about Kiva from opera widgets, and I think that what they're doing is great! It makes me happy to be able to support these entrepreneurs who are working hard to make the world a better place for themselves and their communities! Good luck! And Yay Kiva!

lenders.name: In Memory of Chad
lenders.loan_because: My son Chad was killed by a hit and run driver on 31 Oct 2009.  He was 22 years old when he was killed. My Kiva loans honor his memory. A snowball of helping from a young man who is very deeply loved and eternally missed.

So I would love to be the person to brighten someone's day by letting them know that there is a friend out there that understands what they are going through and I am going to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have numerous disabilities that effect me daily. But I am a full time mom and a part time student at a local college.
